top.title: Danish PM calls snap election with Greenland issue centre-stage
top.summary: The issue of Greenland, which Donald Trump wants to annex, is likely to dominate the election campaign.

top.title: US and Iran hold talks seen as crucial to prevent conflict
top.summary: The indirect negotiations in Geneva are seen as a last-ditch effort, but the chances of a nuclear agreement are unclear.

top.title: Four convicted over spyware scandal that shook Greece
top.summary: In what became known as "Greece's Watergate", surveillance software called Predator was used to target 87 people.

top.title: Instagram to alert parents if teens search for self-harm and suicide content
top.summary: Safety campaigners say Meta is "passing the buck" with its new feature for parents using Instagram's teen supervision tools.

top.title: Chip giant Nvidia defies AI concerns with record $215bn revenue
top.summary: Demand for Nvidia chips rose even as the company sets out to create AI products of its own.

top.title: Not even potholes will hold up self-driving cars, UK firm predicts
top.summary: Wayve says it's confident all cars will one day be autonomous, as it announced more than a £1bn in additional investment.

title.#text: NATO says iPhones are secure enough to handle classified data
Razer’s new laptop sleeve wirelessly charges other devices
Cricut’s most popular cutting machine now takes up less space in your crafting room
